name: Tiny Dino Runner - Beta
description:
The Tiny Dino Runner is a game for the Tiny Dino NFT community. It was created by the similarity of the Chrome Dino with the Tiny Dinos.

How 2 Play:

JumpSpace / Left Mouse ButtonCrouchS / Down / Right Mouse Button



Requirements:
To play the game you need a Web3 capable browser with a wallet extension (MetaMask,...)

Information:
The game is currently in beta. This means the base game is not ready yet. Therefore, I ask you to take 2 minutes and fill out the feedback form, which you can find in the top right corner of the game.

Developer Notice:
I have several goals with this game.  On the one hand, everyone who owns a Tiny Dino should be able to play his Dino. Secondly, I would like to release the game for smartphones as soon as more content is available.

A big point would be to make a P2E game out of it, which is still open. I would like to thank the community for the wonderful support and ask for your patience for the upcoming updates. I try to work on the game every free minute.

Stay tiny - Kiny

Developer | Tiny Dino Community
